item.title: Game Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Sega
item.description: While playing Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles shoga, Mikey once again gets into trouble. This time he managed to break Ralph’s new invention and is now hanging between the portals connecting the possessions of all the enemies of the brave reptiles. Help Michelangelo defeat the enemies and open exactly the portal that leads to his own sewer.
